title: Post DeferredCompute Verification
body:
## Description
After https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/pull/1356 (Thanks @szha and @leezu!), GluonNLP has now fully embraced the new Gluon 2.0 API. We will no longer need to worry about the `hybrid_forward` and can directly use `forward` to write the logic! This will help accelerate the model development.

Post this merge, we will need to verify again our existing scripts:

- [x] [Question Answering](https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/tree/master/scripts/question_answering) (I will do it in https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/pull/1405) 
- [x] [NLP Backbone Benchmark](https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/tree/master/scripts/benchmarks) (I will do it in https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/pull/1405) 
- [x] [Machine Translation](https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/tree/master/scripts/machine_translation) (@xinyual @sxjscience)
- [ ] [BERT MLM + SOP Pretraining](https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/tree/master/scripts/pretraining/bert) (@xinyual @leezu)
- [x] [ELECTRA Pretraining](https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/tree/master/scripts/pretraining) (@szha)
- [x] [Generation Example](https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/tree/master/scripts/generation) (@szha)
- [x] [Conversion Scripts](https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/tree/master/scripts/conversion_toolkits) (@szha)

@szha @szhengac @barry-jin @leezu
